thread.title: Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC Investigates Adequacy of Price and Process in Proposed Sale of SolarWinds, Inc.

title: Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC Investigates Adequacy of Price and Process in Proposed Sale of SolarWinds, Inc.
text: Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC Investigates Adequacy of Price and Process in Proposed Sale of SolarWinds, Inc.   Published on 2015-10-22 09:59:55 SOLARWINDS INVESTOR ALERT BY THE FORMER ATTORNEY GENERAL OF LOUISIANA: Kahn Swick... -- NEW ORLEANS, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  > NEW ORLEANS , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Former Attorney General of Louisiana Charles C. Foti, Jr., Esq. and the law firm of Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC ("KSF") are investigating the proposed sale of SolarWinds, Inc. ("SolarWinds" or the "Company") (NYSE: SWI ) to affiliates of Silver Lake Partners and Thoma Bravo , LLC. Under the terms of the proposed transaction, shareholders of SolarWinds will receive only $60.10 in cash for each share of SolarWinds that they own. KSF is seeking to determine whether this consideration and the process that led to it are adequate, or whether the consideration undervalues the Company. If you believe that this transaction undervalues the Company and/or if you would like to discuss your legal rights regarding the proposed sale, you may, without obligation or cost to you, e-mail or call KSF Managing Partner Lewis S. Kahn ( lewis.kahn@ksfcounsel.com ) toll free at any time at 855-768-1857. To learn more about KSF, whose partners include the Former Louisiana Attorney General, visit www.ksfcounsel.com . Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC
